label: 祈年祭
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Festival held annually on the Fourth Day of the Second Month.  The basic element in the Kinensai, or toshigoe no matsuri, was a prayer (norito) for good crops, offered by the Jingikan at tits Daidairi compound in the present of the assembled Ministers of State and other bureaucrats (p. 401). [年越の祭、祝詞、神祇官、大内裏]
